messages.message:
Some more checklist items:
• Are there regression tests?
• Do we have UAT tests mapped out?
• Is this code unit-tested; if not do we have a plan for unit-testing it?
• Does this app need audit-logs?
• Does this app need metrics?
• Is this App going to be used under load?  Can we run it under load and see how it behaves?

It was on my plate to write these sets of constructs down to ensure that we are promoting the beta-apps to apps concretely.  I’ve been lazy to not write them down; will do it in the next few days
As with our other non-beta apps, the answer is no :slightly_smiling_face:
Yes, I don’t this we are setting the right precedent with other non-beta apps :slightly_smiling_face:
